extendedInfo.description: How fast can you find 5 differences between 2 photos?2 PHOTOS, 5 DIFFERENCES.Your power of observation sharpens as you search for the differences and advance through the modes. Time is not your friend and hints must be used wisely.How to Play:Find the differences between the two pictures shown, then touch on either photo to mark the difference.FEATURES:- FIND the differences between 2 similar pictures quickly â the clock is ticking!- Ideal for playing with family and friends- 3 HINTS will help you along the way if you get stuck - Each mistake will cost you time against the clock- A large number of game pictures to keep you entertainedThis free game will contain some ads. Thank you very much for your support!
